input_args.passage: 'Mitchell, Elizabeth | Maine | “Libby” Mitchell was born in South Carolina, but her hometown is Vassalboro. She attended Furman University for her B.A.; University of North Carolina at Chapel ...'
input_args.claim: 'She also held positions as the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and as President of the Maine Senate (2008–2010), and she was the first woman in the United States to have held both positions.'
